1445970.name: Museum Of Extravagance Demo
1445970.description:
The Museum Of Extravagance is a surreal and unique experience.
Crazy, Fun, Intriguing.
A walking simulator where you explore rooms with surrealist scupltures.


The museum is composed by :

3 Floors !

12 Differents rooms, including 9 with interactivity !

32 Sculptures !

Every room is different !

Every Sculpture has a unique sound !

Screenshot Function Included !
